titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Alfonso Robelo C. papers
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

defitem.label: Encoded by:
defitem.item: Machine-readable finding aid derived from MARC record by David Sun and Microsoft Word file by Elizabeth Phillips.

titlepage.p: © 2009 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches and writings, programmatic statements, agreements, memoranda, press releases, and printed matter, relating to the Nicaraguan revolution of 1979, political and human rights conditions in Nicaragua under the Sandinista government, activities of anti-Sandinista Nicaraguan resistance organizations, relations between these organizations and the United States government, the contra guerrilla war in Nicaragua, negotiations to end the war, and the Nicaraguan election of 1990. Photocopy.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Alfonso Robelo C. papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1992.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals in possession of: A. Robelo.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Nicaraguan junta member, 1979-1980; subsequently leader of anti-Sandinista resistance movements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection relates to the Nicaraguan revolution of 1979, political and human rights conditions in Nicaragua under the Sandinista government, activities of anti-Sandinista Nicaraguan resistance organizations, relations between these organizations and the United States government, the contra guerrilla war in Nicaragua, negotiations to end the war, and the Nicaraguan election of 1990.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Civil rights--Nicaragua.
Guerrillas--Nicaragua.
Elections--Nicaragua.

did.unittitle: Alianza Revolucionaria Democrática (ARDE) speeches and activities file,

scopecontent.p: Includes speeches, articles, letters, and notes concerning ARDE and Edén Pastora.

did.unittitle: Resistencia Nicaragüense and Movimiento Democratico Nicaragüense file,

scopecontent.p: Contains articles, memos, speeches, agreements, and other printed matter relating to anti-Sandinista Nicaraguan resistance organizations and the relations between these organizations and the United States government. Also contains material from the Resistencia Nicaragüense Directorate position held by Robelo, including meeting minutes, notes, articles, speeches, agendas, and proposals.

did.unittitle: Ceasefire talks, Atlantic Coast Miskitos Indians,

scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, proposals, agreements, articles, meeting minutes, reports, memos, and newspaper clippings, mainly on organizations

did.unittitle: Frente Sandinista de Liberación Nacional (FSLN) critiques,
Consejo Superior de la Empresa Privada (COSEP),
Frente Solidaridad Demócrata Cristiano (FSDC), Unión Democrática Nicaragüense-Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias Nicaragüenses (UDN-FARN), and Fuerza Democrática Nicaragüense (FDN),
